biotools.summary: The BioExtract Server is a platform for the creation of bioinformatic workflows to aid the analysis of genomic data. A series of recorded tasks can be saved and shared. Integrated resources include NCBI databases, EMBL-Bank, UniProt and UniRef, as well as a large number of computational tools such as EMBOSS and KEGG.
